name: Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds
description: High-quality sound, comfortable fit, long battery life, compatible with all Bluetooth devices.

name: Organic Cotton T-Shirt
description: Made from 100% organic cotton, soft and breathable fabric, available in various colors and sizes.

name: Laptop Backpack
description: Durable and waterproof, padded compartments for laptops and tablets, multiple pockets for organization.

name: Yoga Mat
description: Non-slip surface, eco-friendly material, lightweight and portable, suitable for yoga and pilates.

name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: Double-wall insulated, keeps drinks hot or cold for hours, BPA-free and leak-proof design.

name: Smartphone Tripod Stand
description: Adjustable height and angle, compatible with most smartphones, stable and sturdy design.

name: Organic Green Tea
description: Premium quality, antioxidant-rich, sourced from sustainable farms, soothing and refreshing.

name: Resistance Bands Set
description: Includes five bands of varying resistance levels, suitable for a wide range of exercises, portable and versatile.

name: Aromatherapy Essential Oil Diffuser
description: Ultrasonic technology, seven LED light colors, automatic shut-off feature, promotes relaxation and stress relief.

name: Eco-Friendly Bamboo Toothbrush
description: Biodegradable bamboo handle, BPA-free bristles, environmentally friendly alternative to plastic toothbrushes.
